title: Kaalia
occurrences: Kallu is about to turn Kaalia! .. Come on!
Kaalia can never attack an unarmed man!
Your master, whom you created yourself .. Kaalia!
Who's this Kaalia? - Don't worry! Whoever Kaalia may be ..
lt's tied to Kaalia's wrist in a gold chain.
Taking the diamond from Kaalia was as difficult as ..
l'm that same Kallu, whom you turned into Kaalia.
Our goods would reach the docks, but Kaalia would take them.
Gold is sent to us from abroad, but reaches Kaalia.
Think of some way to defeat Kaalia.
Find Kaalia's weakness; it is our strength!
There's only one: Kaalia!
All these flowers are for Mr. Kaalia.
ls this man new in Bombay? - You don't know Mr. Kaalia!
To only one person - Kaalia!
But l definitely want to know - who's this Kaalia?
Kaalia is the king of crime, like this pawn is of chess.
This might be the same Kaalia who had once come to my jail.
Kaalia is giving a party today, and dared to even send me a card.
There's Kaalia, whom you wanted to meet.
l had come to meet Kaalia, but it seems he's not at home.
l could have left Kaalia, but where will l go if l leave my Kallu?
Who? Kaalia? - Yes; l want to meet you.
l was waiting for you, Kaalia.
Till Kaalia is hanged, l can't return your daughter to you!
Death arrived before you, Jailer .. Kaalia is no more!
l wanted to hand over Kaalia to the law alive.
The tables have turned again, Kaalia!
